verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> ha-Rei unto the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say הָרֵי֙ <WH2022> ha-Rei Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because אָמַ֧ר <WH559> 'a-Mar hath said הָאוֹיֵ֛ב <WH341> ha-'o-Yev Because the enemy עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem against הֶאָ֑ח <WH1889> he-'Ach; against you Aha וּבָמ֣וֹת <WH1116> u-va-Mot high places עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> o-Lam, even the ancient לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> le-mo-ra-Shah are ours in possession הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> Ha-ye-tah have become לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> la-Chen therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta, and say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֣עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an reason בְּיַ֡עַן <WH3282> be-Ya-'an reason שַׁמּוֹת֩ <WH8074> sham-mOt Because they have made [you] desolate וְשָׁאֹ֨ף <WH7602> ve-sha-'Of and swallowed you up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מִסָּבִ֗יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv, on every side לִֽהְיוֹתְכֶ֤ם <WH1961> lih-yot-Chem become מֽוֹרָשָׁה֙ <WH4181> mo-ra-Shah that ye might be a possession לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> lish-'e-Rit unto the residue הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen וַתֵּֽעֲל֛וּ <WH5927> vat-te-'a-Lu and ye are taken up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- in שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> se-Fat in the lips לָשׁ֖וֹן <WH3956> la-Shon of talkers וְדִבַּת־ <WH1681> ve-dib-bat- and [are] an infamy עָֽם׃ <WH5971> 'Am. of the people

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> ha-Rei Therefore ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; GOD כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְ֠הוִה <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <WH2022> le-ha-Rim to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <WH1389> ve-lag-ge-va-'ot and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <WH650> la-'a-fi-Kim to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֗וֹת <WH1516> ve-lag-ge-'a-Yot, and to the valleys וְלֶחֳרָב֤וֹת <WH2723> ve-le-cho-ra-Vot wastes הַשֹּֽׁמְמוֹת֙ <WH8076> hash-sho-me-mOt desolate וְלֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> ve-le-'a-Rim and to the cities הַנֶּעֱזָב֔וֹת <WH5800> han-ne-'e-za-Vot, that are forsaken אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָי֤וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu have become לְבַז֙ <WH957> le-Vaz which became a prey וּלְלַ֔עַג <WH3933> u-le-La-'ag, and derision לִשְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> lish-'e-Rit to the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv. that [are] round about ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֠א <WH3808> lo not בְּאֵ֨שׁ <WH784> be-'Esh Surely in the fire קִנְאָתִ֥י <WH7068> kin-'a-Ti of my jealousy דִבַּ֛רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti have I spoken עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit against the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim of the heathen וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and against אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> e-Dom and against all Idumea כֻּלָּ֑א <WH3605> kul-La; all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נָתְנֽוּ־ <WH5414> na-te-nu- which have appointed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַרְצִ֣י׀ <WH776> 'ar-Tzi my land לָ֠הֶם <WH1992> La-hem as לְמ֨וֹרָשָׁ֜ה <WH4181> le-Mo-ra-Shah into their possession בְּשִׂמְחַ֤ת <WH8057> be-sim-Chat with the joy כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all לֵבָב֙ <WH3824> le-Vav of all [their] heart בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <WH7589> bish-'At with despiteful נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh, minds לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of מִגְרָשָׁ֖הּ <WH4054> mig-ra-Shah to cast it out לָבַֽז׃ <WH957> la-Vaz. for a prey

לָכֵ֕ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve Prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> 'ad-Mat therefore concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לֶהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> le-ha-Rim unto the mountains וְ֠לַגְּבָעוֹת <WH1389> Ve-lag-ge-va-'ot and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֨ים <WH650> la-'a-fi-Kim to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֜וֹת <WH1516> ve-lag-ge-'a-Yot and to the valleys כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold בְקִנְאָתִ֤י <WH7068> ve-kin-'a-Ti in my jealousy וּבַחֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> u-va-cha-ma-Ti and in my fury דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, Behold I have spoken יַ֛עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an because כְּלִמַּ֥ת <WH3639> ke-lim-Mat the shame גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> go-Yim of the heathen נְשָׂאתֶֽם׃ <WH5375> ne-sa-Tem. because ye have borne

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti I have lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדִ֑י <WH3027> ya-Di; mine hand אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> hag-go-Yim Surely the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> mis-sa-Viv, that [are] about הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah will themselves כְּלִמָּתָ֥ם <WH3639> ke-lim-ma-Tam their shame יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <WH5375> yis-Sa-'u. you they shall bear

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> ve-'at-Tem O הָרֵ֤י <WH2022> ha-Rei But ye O mountains יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַנְפְּכֶ֣ם <WH6057> 'an-pe-Chem your branches תִּתֵּ֔נוּ <WH5414> tit-Te-nu, ye shall shoot forth וּפֶרְיְכֶ֥ם <WH6529> u-fer-ye-Chem your fruit תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> tis-'U and yield לְעַמִּ֣י <WH5971> le-'am-Mi to my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for קֵרְב֖וּ <WH7126> ke-re-Vu for they are at hand לָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> la-Vo. to come

כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem; about וּפָנִ֣יתִי <WH6437> u-fa-Ni-ti For behold I [am] for you and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem, to you וְנֶעֱבַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH5647> ve-ne-'e-vad-Tem unto you and ye shall be tilled וְנִזְרַעְתֶּֽם׃ <WH2232> ve-niz-ra'-Tem. and sown

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <WH7235> ve-hir-bei-Ti And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem and אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, men כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit upon you all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <WH3605> kul-Loh; all וְנֹֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> ve-no-she-Vu shall be inhabited הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> he-'a-Rim, [even] all of it and the cities וְהֶחֳרָב֖וֹת <WH2723> ve-he-cho-ra-Vot and the wastes תִּבָּנֶֽינָה׃ <WH1129> tib-ba-Nei-nah. shall be builded

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <WH7235> ve-hir-bei-Ti And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem on אָדָ֥ם <WH120> 'a-Dam upon you man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> u-ve-he-Mah and beast וְרָב֣וּ <WH7235> ve-ra-Vu and they shall increase וּפָר֑וּ <WH6509> u-fa-Ru; and bring fruit וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֨י <WH3427> ve-ho-shav-Ti and I will settle אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> 'et-Chem כְּקַדְמֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH6927> ke-kad-mo-tei-Chem, you after your old estates וְהֵטִֽבֹתִי֙ <WH2895> ve-he-ti-vo-Ti and will do better מֵרִאשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7221> me-ri-Sho-tei-Chem, [unto you] than at your beginnings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹלַכְתִּי֩ <WH1980> ve-ho-lach-Ti along עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem and אָדָ֜ם <WH120> 'a-Dam Yea I will cause men אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֤י <WH5971> 'am-Mi upon you [even] my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El Israel וִֽירֵשׁ֔וּךָ <WH3423> vi-re-Shu-cha, and they shall possess וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ta you will become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> le-na-cha-Lah; thee and thou shalt be their inheritance וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not תוֹסִ֥ף <WH3254> to-Sif and thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od again לְשַׁכְּלָֽם׃ <WH7921> le-shak-ke-Lam. henceforth bereave ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Ya-'an Because אֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim Because they say לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, אֹכֶ֥לֶת <WH398> 'o-Che-let unto you Thou [land] devourest up אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam men; אָתִּי 'at-ti כאָ֑תְּ <WH859> 'At; you קוּמְשַׁכֶּ֥לֶת <WH7921> u-me-shak-Ke-let and hast bereaved; גֹּויֵךְ go-yech כגֹּויַ֖יִךְ <WH1471> go-Ya-yich Gentile קהָיִֽית׃ <WH1961> ha-Yit. become

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, therefore אָדָם֙ <WH120> 'a-Dam men לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- will no תֹ֣אכְלִי <WH398> Toch-li Therefore thou shalt devour ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, longer; וְגֹויֵךְ ve-go-yech כוְגֹויַ֖יִךְ <WH1471> ve-go-Ya-yich Gentile קלֹ֣א <WH3808> lo and no; תְכַשְּׁלִי־ te-chash-she-li- כתְשַׁכְּלִי־ <WH3782> te-shak-ke-li- bereave ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; longer קנְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor אַשְׁמִ֨יעַ <WH8085> 'ash-Mi-a' Neither will I cause [men] to hear אֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> 'e-La-yich about עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od anymore כְּלִמַּ֣ת <WH3639> ke-lim-Mat in thee the shame הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <WH2781> ve-cher-Pat the reproach עַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim of the people לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תִשְׂאִי־ <WH5375> tis-'i- any more neither shalt thou bear ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; any; וְגֹויֵךְ ve-go-yech כוְגֹויַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1471> ve-go-Ya-yich the nations קלֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תַכְשִׁ֣לִי <WH3782> tach-Shi-li to fall ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, longer נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD ס sa-Mek
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> beit when the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> yo-she-Vim dwelt עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- their own אַדְמָתָ֔ם <WH127> 'ad-ma-Tam, in their own land וַיְטַמְּא֣וּ <WH2930> vay-tam-me-'U they defiled אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> o-Tah, בְּדַרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> be-dar-Kam it by their own way וּבַעֲלִֽילוֹתָ֑ם <WH5949> u-va-'a-li-lo-Tam; and by their doings כְּטֻמְאַת֙ <WH2932> ke-tum-'At me as the uncleanness הַנִּדָּ֔ה <WH5079> han-nid-Dah, of a removed woman הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become דַרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> dar-Kam their way לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> le-fa-Nai. was before

וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֤ךְ <WH8210> va-'esh-Poch Wherefore I poured חֲמָתִי֙ <WH2534> cha-ma-Ti my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem, and עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַדָּ֖ם <WH1818> had-Dam upon them for the blood אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which שָׁפְכ֣וּ <WH8210> sha-fe-Chu that they had shed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; upon the land וּבְגִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> u-ve-gil-lu-lei-Hem and for their idols טִמְּאֽוּהָ׃ <WH2930> tim-me-'U-ha. [wherewith] they had polluted
